description: Stats relating to the perfromance of the kafka pods

panels.description: The total memory being used inside Kafka pod $kafka. It is a sum of the memory in use by the containers inside the pod
panels.title: Total Memory Usage by $kafka

panels.description: Graph showing the memory usage and limits for each container in kafka pod $kafka
panels.title: Memory Usage by kafka $kafka

panels.description: The total CPU in use by kafka pod $kafka. It is a sum of the CPU usage by the containers inside the pod
panels.title: Total CPU for $kafka

panels.description: Graph showing the CPU usage and limits for each container in kafka pod $kafka
panels.title: CPU for kafka $kafka

panels.description: The rate of byte transfer into the kafka pod $kafka. this data, does not necessarily go to kafka as there are other containers, but almost all of it will go to kafka
panels.title: Byte rate into pod $kafka

panels.description: The rate of byte transfer into the kafka $kafka container. this data does not include kafka to kafka traffic such as replication
panels.title: Byte rate into $kafka - kafka container

panels.description: Graph showing the byte rate for data flowing into the kafka pod and container
panels.title: Byte rate into kafka $kafka

panels.description: The rate of byte transfer out of the kafka pod $kafka. this data, does not necessarily come from kafka as there are other containers, but almost all of it will have come from kafka
panels.title: Byte rate out of pod $kafka

panels.description: The rate of byte transfer out of the kafka $kafka container. this data does not include kafka to kafka traffic such as replication
panels.title: Byte rate out of $kafka - kafka container

panels.description: Graph showing the byte rate for data flowing into the kafka pod and container
panels.title: Byte rate out of kafka pod $kafka

panels.description: The Kafka proxy proxies traffic from clients to the kafka pods. Therefore it is an important part of the message flow. This tracks the CPU usage of Kafka proxy $proxy
panels.title: CPU Usage by Proxy $proxy

panels.description: The Kafka proxy proxies traffic from clients to the kafka pods. Therefore it is an important part of the message flow. This tracks the CPU usage and limit of Kafka proxy $proxy over time
panels.title: CPU for proxy $proxy

panels.description: The Kafka proxy proxies traffic from clients to the kafka pods. Therefore it is an important part of the message flow. This tracks the byte rate into and our of the kafka proxy
panels.title: Byte rates for proxy $proxy

panels.description: The Kafka proxy proxies traffic from clients to the kafka pods. Therefore it is an important part of the message flow. This tracks the Memory usage of Kafka proxy $proxy
panels.title: Memory usage by edge proxy $proxy

panels.description: The Kafka proxy proxies traffic from clients to the kafka pods. Therefore it is an important part of the message flow. This tracks the Memory usage and limits of Kafka proxy $proxy
panels.title: Memory Usage by edge proxy $proxy

panels.description: The collector collects metrics data on messages flowing through the system. Looking at all this data may end up having a performance impact. This tracks the total CPU usage of the collector as a sum of the containers
panels.title: CPU for Collector $collector

panels.description: The collector collects metrics data on messages flowing through the system. Looking at all this data may end up having a performance impact. This tracks the CPU of the collector
panels.title: CPU for Collector $collector

panels.description: The collector collects metrics data on messages flowing through the system. Looking at all this data may end up having a performance impact. This tracks the byte rate into and out of the collector
panels.title: Byte rates for collector $collector

panels.description: The collector collects metrics data on messages flowing through the system. Looking at all this data may end up having a performance impact. This tracks the total memory usage of the collector
panels.title: Memory usage by collector $collector

panels.description: The collector collects metrics data on messages flowing through the system. Looking at all this data may end up having a performance impact. This tracks the memory usage of the collectors containers
panels.title: Memory Usage by collector $collector

title: IBM Event Streams Performance Dashboard
